title: Grand Opening: Quality Inn Just 20 Minutes from Sydney Harbour
description: Reach famous Sydney sights like the gorgeous Royal Botanic Gardens, the famous Harbour Bridge and the renowned Opera House in just 20 minutes from the brand-new Quality Inn Sunshine Haberfield Sydney. Be among the first to experience this recently opened Quality Inn property in Sydney's west with a complimentary upgrade to a King Deluxe Room, a one-time complimentary non-alcoholic minibar, daily light continental breakfast and a guaranteed 11am late checkout.
offer_address: 169-173 Parramatta Rd, Haberfield Ashfield New South Wales 2045 Australia
